title: ELDEN RING Gameplay Preview Reactions
description:
Blessing and Andy are joined by Tamoor to watch and discuss Elden Ring's gameplay preview. It's longer than 15 minutes! Is it everything they wanted? 

Epic Creator Code: KindaFunny
